rows.label: tev001111_MSG0010
rows.name:
I know the situation looks dire,
but a BLADE's work is never over.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001111_MSG0020
rows.name:
Let's deal with the issues one at a time,
starting with whatever's in front of us.
And you've got my help, if you want it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001111_MSG0050
rows.name:
Good. Let's not get overwhelmed here.
We can take things one step at a time,
like we always do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001111_MSG0080
rows.name:
Understood. Just promise me you won't
get in over your head, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001111_MSG0090
rows.name:
There's still some time left. Why don't you
speak to the others? I'm sure they'd all
appreciate some words of encouragement.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001111_MSG0100
rows.name:
I may have nominally been the team's
leader, but you were the one who always
pushed us forward, who kept us together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001111_MSG0110
rows.name:
You'll have to use those qualities to the
fullest in the coming mission as well.
...No pressure, though.[ST:wait ]
